text:
@NYGovCuomo #GovCuomo As much as I feel that for a SHORT PERIOD longer People should ON THEIR OWN be wearing 😷 what you are doing is #unconstitutional
Maybe you should have worried about sending #COVID19 positive patients  back into #nursinghomes instead of micromanaging peoples lives
